Message:
That’s the number of
homunculi I’ve made so far.

but that’s the latest
specimen’s serial number,
so I’ve figured as much.

The average lifespan of
a homunculus is three days.

However, out of all
the specimens thus far,

this new one has the most
potent magic power.

Three days have passed,
but its heart has yet to
cease functioning.

If I can develop
this specimen into a witch,
then it will mean tremendous
progress for my research.

Understanding how to turn
a person into a witch should also
shed light on how to do the reverse.

Hence, I should be able to restore
this cursed body of mine.
